thread.title: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 7: Sonam Kapoor shakes a leg with Salman Khan
thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 7: Sonam Kapoor shakes a leg with Salman Khan - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 7: Sonam Kapoor shakes a leg with Salman Khan
text:
Welcoming his Prem Ratan Dhan Payo co-star Sonam Kapoor, superstar Salman Khan kick-started the Sunday episode. Elated to have Sonam on Bigg Boss Nau, Salman makes a grand entry with the lady by shaking a leg with her on the title track - Prem Ratan Dhan Payo.*Salman and Sonam dance on the sets of Bigg Boss 9*
The duo then ... Â»
